The game stayed tied through the 6th inning. In the top of the 7th, freshman Brendan Walker drilled a double to score Jayden Chapman from first to bring the Devils ahead 2 to 1. Spencer Crittenden followed with a double to center field to score Walker.

Matthew Kleinfelter finished his complete game by holding the Rebels in the bottom of the 7th. Kleinfelter only allowed 1 run and held Patrick Henry to four hits.

The boys will play for the 1A State Championship tomorrow morning. The game will begin at 9 am at Calfee Park in Pulaski, VA.

Kimberly White
June 6, 2019 at 8:02 AM ·

This apron is 1 of 20 given, out of over 20,000 applicants. It represents courage, passion, ambition, and most importantly, a memorial to my brother Chris, who passed away before we could audition together... After I had given up cooking for over a year and a half, I talked myself out of the audition, and not-so-coincidentally, my audition date landed exactly on my brother’s birthday. This apron is a symbol that you should NEVER permanently give up, and ALWAYS follow your dreams, no matter how scary or crazy—no matter how the odds are stacked against you. The opportunities that scare you the most have the biggest rewards. MasterChef is a small stepping stone to a gargantuan lesson that I had forgotten under the perils of life’s hardships. I will never forget this moment, and what it gave back to me ❤️ Thank you so much @gordongram @chef_aaronsanchez and @jbastianich for being 3 “Yes’s” in a world rampant with “No’s.”

#MasterChef

shared_text:
Lancaster High School, Virginia
May 10, 2019 at 7:00 PM ·

This year the VSGA-VIP SCHOLARSHIP FOUNDATION awarded $88,000 to 31 students, including 29 high school seniors.

In addition to an interest in golf, the Foundation’s selection committee also considered academic achievement, outside activities including community service, as well as an essay outlining the influence of golf on the applicant’s life.

Funding for scholarships is generated primarily through the sale of the VSGA VIP Golf Card. Since being launched in 1984, the program has awarded nearly $2.4 million and benefited more than 1,000 students.

Please join us in congratulating Roman Cutler who received a $3,000 scholarship.

Best wishes and continued success at VCU.

CONGRATULATIONS!!! 8th grader Victoria Ray O'Shaughnessy Geier has won 1st place in the Tidewater Region of the (Virginia School Boards Association) VSBA Art Contest! Yearly, schools are invited to enter one exceptional piece of art to be viewed with others of same age category and are judged based on artistic merit. Victorias' stunning work of sisters using pencil and watercolor is unique and was appreciated. The piece will be framed and displayed on a rotation basis in the offices of the Secretary of Education/State Superintendent and the Virginia School Boards Association through the year. All winning pieces will be affixed with an engraved plate and will be returned at the 2020 VSBA Art Contest competition. For the first time ever, an anonymous donor will be granting all winners with a $100 savings bond. Victoria will be honored at the May School Board meeting May 14th.

Our Bright Futures School Bank employees visited one of our favorite restaurants, NN Burger, today for milkshakes as a mid year treat! post_text: If you didn’t get the chance to attend the public meeting last night, here’s your chance to see our new building plans. You’ll need a separate device from the one you’re using to view this post to click on the QR codes. You are welcome to come learn more about the project, show your support and share your ideas.

Lancaster Middle School, Kilmarnock, VA
January 31, 2019 at 4:22 PM ·

LMS officially houses the 2019 Northern Neck District Basketball Champs!!! The boys finished the season undefeated! They captured the championship last night by defeating Northumberland 41-22! Hats off to the players and coaches for a memorable season! Also, congratulations to Coach Waddy and her 2019 cheerleaders on finishing up a successful season!!! Way to go girls! All of you have made the LMS family PROUD! 🏀🏀🏀🏆🏆🏆
